creator: Tommy.Johnson@sabre.com
text:
Create a Response Assertion and check the "NOT" box in the Pattern matching 
rules (i.e. this is a "does not contain" response assertion).
Create an Assertion Results.
If the assertion fails this is correctly reported in Assertion Results, however 
the message displayed is:
		Test Failed, expected to contain: foo

The expected message is:
		Test Failed, expected NOT to contain: foo

This was already reported as bug 24443, and was fixed in CVS some while ago.

If the problem still occurs with 2.0.0, please advise.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 24443 ***
creator: sebb@apache.org
